QuestData.Title: Vordrassil's Seeds
QuestData.Description: We cannot allow Vordrassil to grow again. If the furbolg regrew it once, they can do it again.$B$BGo to Grizzlemaw, in central Grizzly Hills, and obtain Vordrassil's seeds. I will make sure they're properly disposed of.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge wants you to go to Grizzlemaw and obtain 8 of Vordrassil's Seeds.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. I'll take those from you.$B$BThe corruptive power of these seeds is dangerous. I must destroy them right away.
